about_the_game:
Content:

Days with Evraco: The Blind Witch in Blue Forest- Theme song(MP3, WAV)

MP4

Theme song CG

Lyrics: 中文, 日本語, English (docx)

"Waiting for the Dawn"

Composer/Arranger: Kino

Lyricist: Konomi Himemiya

Main Singer: Sourai

/

"朝焼けを待って"

音楽：キノ

作詞：姫宮このみ

歌唱：Sourai

/

A1 0:00~0:28

Alone on that day, I prayed and wished upon a star

Our intertwined thoughts wove a story of the end

A2 0:37~0:59

Like a bird without wings struggling on the ground
Even if the soul is no more, I hope we can remain closely connected

B1 1:00~1:22

With white magic that melts the world
Swallowing the shadows of the trees, closing my eyes

sabi1 1:23~1:45

No matter how many times the crescent moon returns, dawn may never come to that forest
If I could be embraced by you once more

B2 2:08~2:30

The ancient magic that sealed the heart
Is dissolved and stripped away by warm tears

sabi2 2:34~2:53

No matter how many times I atone, the days that have passed cannot return
If I could have one more wish, I would only wish to see you again

sabi3 2:54~3:16

No matter how many times the morning sun rises, dawn may never come to that forest
If I could be embraced by you once more
